text:
@ScottMorrisonMP https://t.co/yYMHvlGRmv
You've been warned TEACHERS WILL DIE, but  you ignore and play down the danger. 
This will cost lives.
As for Jobkeeper a lot of businesses don't have the cash flow to pay out until the government reimbursement. 
We need a LEVEL 4 LOCKDOWN to have a hope.
